intro: Telinaria sagittalis, commonly known as the arrowhead plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is native to South America and is characterized by its distinctive arrowhead-shaped leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that are typically clustered in dense heads. Telinaria sagittalis is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and compact growth habit. It prefers well-drained soil and partial to full sunlight, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor cultivation.
